text: @NC_Governor Thank you Governor! To the @GOPconvention, @NCGOP be clear: this mess is B/C OF #POTUS45 He is ENTIRELY at fault here. If Trump hadn't tweeted temper tantrums & ordered plans that even the loosest #covid19 restrictions cannot allow, your convention prep would be going smoothly.
